src:
Osnovan Vojvodjanski front

07 Nov 2019, 14:10

Liga socijaldemokrata Vojvodine (LSV), Vojvodjanska partija (VP) i Demokratski savez Hrvata u Vojvodini (DSHV), potpisali su danas Sporazum o saradnji kroz Vojvodjanski front, saopštio je sekretarijat LSV.Sporazum su u ime ovih partija, potpisali njihovi predsednici Nenad Čanak (LSV), Aleksandar Odžić (VP) i Tomislav Žigmanov (DSHV).Lider VP Aleksandar Odžić podsetio je na potpisivanju da su početkom godine LSV i VP potpisale sporazum o saradnji, kada su najavili širenje i okupljanje oko Vojvodjanskog fronta."Današnjim potpisivanjem sporazuma taj proces neće stati, već će u budućnosti dobiti nove članice", kazao je Odžić.On je naglasio da politički život postoji i van Beograda, odnosno da postoje ljude koji žive, rade i u Vojvodini se bave politikom."U budućnosti će Vojvodjanski front sasvim sigurno, to i danas možemo konstatovati, biti snažan politički opozicioni savez, koji će igrati dominantnu ulogu kad je u pitanju politički život u Vojvodini, ali isto tako i u čitavoj državi", poručio je Odžić.Lider DSHV Tomislav Žigmanov je istakao da ta stranka, kao najjača i jedina relevantna politička snaga hrvatske zajednice u Srbiji, zainteresovana za budućnost Srbije, a samim tim i za budućnost Vojvodine."Mi smo pod istim kišobranom već skoro 30 godina, tu se osećamo najbolje, želimo biti konstruktivni učesnici i pouzdani partneri kada je reč o realizaciji ovih ciljeva za hrvatsku zajednicu koja je ranjena, često puta na marginama društvenog života u Vojvodini", rekao je on.Predsednik LSV Nenad Čanak je napomenuo da ovakav tip okupljanja u Vojvodini može biti "seme iz koga može izrasti i podsećanje ljudi u centralnoj Srbiji i Beogradu, da gradjanska, nadnacionalna i demokratska opcija nisu zauvek nestale, da one imaju svoje predstavnike".Odgovarajući na pitanja novinara, on je rekao da je na predstojećim izborima moguća koalicija ove tri stranke, kojima će se, verovatno, pridružiti još neke vojvodjanske partije.
text:
Vojvodina Front founded

07 Nov 2019, 13:10

The League of Social Democrats of Vojvodina (LSV), the Vojvodina Party (VP) and the Democratic Union of Croats in Vojvodina (DSHV) signed a Cooperation Agreement today through the Vojvodina Front, the LSV Secretariat announced. The agreement was signed on behalf of these parties by their respective presidents, Nenad Canak ( LSV), Aleksandar Odzic (VP) and Tomislav Zigmanov (DSHV). VP leader Aleksandar Odzic recalled that LSV and VP signed a cooperation agreement at the beginning of the year when they announced the expansion and gathering around the Vojvodina Front. the process will not stop, but will receive new members in the future, "Odzic said. He stressed that political life exists outside of Belgrade, that is, there are people who live, work, and engage in politics in Vojvodina." In the future, the Vojvodina Front will surely , we can still state that today, to be a strong political opposition alliance, which will play a dominant role when it comes to political life in Vojvodina, but also t if throughout the country, "Odzic said. DSHV leader Tomislav Zigmanov said that the party, as the strongest and only relevant political force in the Croatian community in Serbia, is interested in the future of Serbia and, therefore, in the future of Vojvodina." umbrella for almost 30 years, we feel the best here, we want to be constructive participants and reliable partners when it comes to realizing these goals for the wounded Croatian community, often on the sidelines of social life in Vojvodina, "he said. LSV President Nenad Canak He noted that this type of gathering in Vojvodina could be "a seed from which people from central Serbia and Belgrade can grow, and that the civic, supranational and democratic options have not disappeared forever, that they have their representatives." said that a coalition of the three parties is possible in the upcoming elections, with some more Vojvodina parties likely to join.
